dict.string: #!/usr/bin/env ruby require ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"] + "/lib/tm/executor" require ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"] + "/lib/tm/save_current_document" require ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"] + "/lib/escape" TextMate.save_current_document TextMate::Executor.make_project_master_current_document args = [] args << "racket" << "-l" << "errortrace" << "-t" TextMate::Executor.run(args, ENV["TM_FILEPATH"]) do |line,type| if line =~ /(.*):([0-9]+):([0-9]+):(.*)/ then unless ENV["TM_FILE_IS_UNTITLED"] == "true" "#{htmlize($1)}:#{$2}:#{$3}:#{htmlize($4)}" else "#{htmlize($1)}:#{$2}:#{$3}:#{htmlize($4)}" end end end
